title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Adolescent Financial Management Capability Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic financial terminology and personal budget management concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Through mobile learning based on daily life scenarios, adolescents can accurately explain 80% or more of the financial decision-making process.
In scenario-based assessment activities, learners successfully apply balanced financial management strategies (investment/saving/spending) three or more times.
After completing mobile learning modules, learners achieve 75 points or higher (out of 100) on formative assessments, meeting financial literacy standards.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
